Traits.Name: Phasing
Traits.Description: Can ignore obstruction and pass through, but not end your turn in, terrain or characters.

Traits.Name: Defiance
Traits.Description: Prevents hit points from being reduced past 1 hp. When this triggers, remove this effect and character becomes immune to all damage for the rest of the current turn.

Traits.Name: Drifting Mist
Traits.Description: Has evasion while in the area of a terrain effect or adjacent to a space of terrain height 1 or higher.

Interrupts.Name: Reform
Interrupts.Trigger: The hob is damaged by an attack or ability.

Actions.Name: Spirit Away
Actions.Description: The Hob swaps places with a character in range 2, teleporting both. If either character cannot teleport, this move cannot be made.
